ygData.subject: Re: Why I don't play a Warrior
ygData.msgSnippet: OK look, I am not flaming anyone at all so please don t use that term with me. I am stating a fact: I don t want to hear someone s opinions on why warriors
ygData.messageBody:
OK look, I am not flaming anyone at all so please don't use that term with
me. I am stating a fact: I don't want to hear someone's opinions on why
warriors suck on a warrior board for them to tell me how great their cleric
is. Who cares that it was a cleric? It could have easily been a Wizard or a
Necro, there's no difference. The point was that this is a warriors board to
help people who want to play warriors, not for people to discuss the
differences between clerics and warriors and decide who is better at what.
Lastly I do want to quote you on something though...
"And believe it or not probably the only few classes you COULD compare would
be
wars vs clerics
wars vs pallys
wars vs SKs
wars vs monks"

Ok time to play a game...anyone ever watch Sesame Street? They have this
game where one thing doesn't belong in the group of other things...like a
screwdriver, a hammer, a saw, and then an apple. Get the point? Monks:
fighter type. Paladin: Fighter type. Shadow Knights: The word Knight speaks
for itself. Cleric: Spellcaster. Clerics were never meant to be fighters,
that is why there is a hybrid cleric/fighter and that is a paladin. Clerics
are priests. Again, this is not a flame. I am happy that you find joy in
playing a cleric, I really truly am. I play a monk, a Magician and a Ranger
all quite often as well. But I don't come on this board and tell everyone
how much more fulfilling it is for me to play my monk rather than my
warrior. I am sorry that I might be taking this so personally, but I can
compare it to you walking into an all african-american convention and
shouting that you hate black people. Imagine the response?

Jynxx



----- Original Message -----
From: Zwanenburg, John <ZWANENJ@...>
To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 1:57 PM
Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] Why I don't play a Warrior


> From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>
>
> Read down to see my inserts....
>
>
> > From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
> >
> > That isn't the point John Zwanenburg. The inital post made by Wayne
> > started
> > out saying "Warriors suck..." and continued to degrade the class from
> > there. He happened to use a cleric to back up his points on why
warriors
> > sucked. I felt it was my duty to defend a class that I put hard work
into
> > and, I might add, I play QUITE well.
> >
> I know that he was trashing the warrior class, i however am not trashing
the
> class at all
> I have played a warrior, probably longer than you ( not that it matters)
and
> have found a class
> that i prefer and was stating the differences between them. And yes i can
> believe you when you
> say that you play the class quite well because i for one felt i played it
> very good as well.
>
> That all depends on the player once again.
>
>
> > Comparing warriors to clerics is like
> > comparing apples to oranges, there is no comparison.
> >
> Well, if you cant compare two classes then what can you compare? There
will
> always be comparison.
> And believe it or not probably the only few classes you COULD compare
would
> be
> wars vs clerics
> wars vs pallys
> wars vs SKs
> wars vs monks
>
>
> > Oh yeah and John, you
> > DID say that you can take as well as a warrior....here is your exact
> > words.
> >
> >
> > > My cleric can
> > > take just as good as a warrior, my ac is damn high and my buffs add to
> > > that.
> > >
> > You might have meant 'tank' and fat fingered, but in the context that
you
> > presented there it does seem like you were saying your cleric can take
> > (damage) as good as a warrior. Even if you said tank I still would
> > disagree
> > with you.
> >
> >
> I did happen to have a typo there, it happens sometimes. Its not feasible
> for me to state i can take as much
> damage as a warrior can take, but i can TANK as good as them. i can dodge,
> (quite often surprisingly) and my ac
> isnt anything to skoff at. My ac is the same as any warrior of my level.
>
> > And I don't think anyone is reading this list because they moved to
> > another
> > one.
> >
> >
> Oh well, their loss i guess.
>
>
> > > ----------
> > > From: Zwanenburg, John[SMTP:ZWANENJ@...]
> > > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 12:47 PM
> > > To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> > > Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] Why I don't play a Warrior
> > >
> > > From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
> > >
> > > Jynxx,
> > >
> > > Gee did we hit a nerve there or what? Last time i checked the amount
of
> > > people actually using this board was less than 5. And yeah i know its
a
> > > warriors discussion board but oh whats this? Even tho we are talking
> > about
> > > clerics AND warriors, we are discussing something!!! Isnt that the
> > point?
> > >
> > > Oh and Brian jones, i didnt say that I could take as much damage, i
said
> > i
> > > could tank just as well. My cleric isnt skimping out on HP but he isnt
a
> > > troll warrior. I ususally tank for my group.
> > >
> > > Oh and Jynxx, Ive taken damage from level 30ish mobs with both my
> > warrior
> > > and cleric and yeah i can last.
> > >
> > > If your pissed, flame me back, i couldnt care less. If you dont want
to
> > > discuss this then fine. That doesnt bother me either, but this is a
> > > discussion board and yes our topic right now does include warriors. Oh
> > and
> > > one last time for the record. My cleric is far better than my warrior
> > ever
> > > was.
> > >
> > > (BTW: My warrior is level 43 and my cleric is level 34)
> > >
> > > Rayne
> > >
> > > > ----------
> > > > From: Jynxx[SMTP:jynxx@...]
> > > > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > > Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 1:21 PM
> > > > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Why I don't play a Warrior
> > > >
> > > > From: "Jynxx" <jynxx@...>
> > > >
> > > > Ok...clerics heal. Blah blah blah....who cares? This is a board for
> > > > WARRIORS, not clerics. I am sorry if I am offending anyone by saying
> > > this,
> > > > but please keep your cleric opinions to yourselves. If I wanted to
> > hear
> > > > about the virtues of playing a cleric vs. playing a warrior I would
> > have
> > > > joined a cleric board. Last time I looked the list was called
> > > > 'Warriors_eq'
> > > > and had nothing to do with Clerics. If you have fun playing a cleric
> > out
> > > > there, be down...have all the fun you want. Just don't tell me that
I
> > > > don't
> > > > do anything because I am a warrior because even with all your heals
> > you
> > > > couldn't be half as vital in a group as I am. Without a warrior to
> > save
> > > > your
> > > > arse from getting hit by that 31st level mob you'd be dead in 7
> > seconds
> > > > flat...well maybe 10 if you got a heal in there. Bottom line: Don't
> > come
> > > > to
> > > > my board telling me I suck, cause it's gonna tick me (and a lot of
> > other
> > > > GOOD warriors) off really bad.
> > > >
> > > > Tyveris,
> > > > Blue Samurai of the Butterfly Rank
> > > >
> > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > From: Clancy <tcashio3@...>
> > > > To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>

> > > > >
> > > > > Umm... whoever says this about clerics is stupid as hell
> > > > >
> > > > > At lvl 31 I group consistantly with a cleric. This class is
> > amazing.
> > > > If
> > > > > you think all they do is heal, you are very very wrong. Their
dd's
> > do
> > > > stun
> > > > > (amazing for rogues) and they can heal better than any other
class.
> > I
> > > > want
> > > > > to see your two druids heal you to full from 1 bar of life
> > > > >
> > > > > Also if all you fight is yellows and reds you need to rethink your
> > > > leveling
> > > > > process. Whites and blues are excellent to fight if you are in
> > groups
> > > > that
> > > > > handle large numbers well. Before you say all clerics do is heal,
> > > play
> > > > one,
> > > > > or play with a good one.
> > > > >
